item.description: Have you ever wanted to attend a beginners service and bring your baby/toddler along, but your tired of everyone looking at you with eyes saying " SHHhh keep your baby quiet....this is a temple"? Well this year we are introducing a whole new way to pray. Bring your baby/toddler/child for an amazing interactive children's Rosh Hashana service/program. We will be having a special mommy and me circle time at 10:30 am followed with free play,snacks and games. We will also be having babysitting available for those parents who want to sit and enjoy the beginners service. (RSVP is a must for the babysitting part) The children program is from 10:30-1:00 including lunch! You don't want to miss this great opportunity! And we promise you all children are welcome to make as much noise as they like .......the children are the future!

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Mommy and me on Rosh Hashana
